title: Blue Essence
body:
So here's the case, you need at least S- to get Level 6 tokens and at least S to get Level 7 tokens. Shouldn't there be a reward for getting S+ on a champion with level 7 mastery?

I was thinking Riot should reward players with blue essence if they are able to achieve an S+ rank on a champion with level 7 Mastery. Thoughts?

replies.body: You can buy blue essence with IP now, and hell, buy 6300 champs for cheaper then 6300 once you have all the lower value champions (1700*3= 5100, so a 1200 IP saving) and you still want to be able to get free essence?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YkEJJyUK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-04T11:00:39.386+0000)
>
> You can buy blue essence with IP now, 

Can you screenshot where this is? I can't find it in the shop.
Well doesn't have to be essence, but some sort of reward for achieving S+ rank on a level 7 mastery champion.

S and S+ are currently for Mastery Emote 7. I think Riot has added enough Mastery Emotes.

But you never know, they could more O.o
